Text: Final issue? Is someone else taking over or is the series just ending? This started out with such promise.

Larsen announced several months ago that he wasn't continuing it. He may want to focus on Savage Dragon more, but honestly I suspect it has more to do with Rob Liefeld quitting DC and returning to his own properties.

Yeah, Liefeld has been rumored to be going back to Image to relaunch Extreme. Hopefully this will be a good thing and we can get some of those old school comics back like Youngblood, Brigade, Bloodstrike and Bloodwulf
